about_the_game:
Planning on going somewhere? Why not make your character movements super realistic with the real accompaniment of the sound of footsteps! Featuring many different types of wooden / stone / metal flooring, walking and running variations, walking through grass and gravel, splashing through water and more, this pack will bring those epic treks to life!

Features:

* 45 SE (Sound Effect).
* All the different "footsteps" sounds! On floors made of metal, stone, wood. Steps on the ground featuring lawn, sand, snow and more!
* M4A (ACC) OGG and WAV formats included.

Tracklist:

KSE_Footsteps_Flooring_Metal x 5 files (3 steps in 3 versions / Single walking / Single running)
KSE_Footsteps_Flooring_Stone x 5 files (3 steps in 3 versions / Single walking / Single running)
KSE_Footsteps_Flooring_Wood x 10 files (3 steps in 3 versions / Single walking / Single running)
KSE_Footsteps_Ground_Gravel x 5 files (3 steps in 3 versions / Single walking / Single running)
KSE_Footsteps_Ground_Lawn x 5 files (3 steps in 3 versions / Single walking / Single running)
KSE_Footsteps_Ground_Sand x 5 files (3 steps in 3 versions / Single walking / Single running)
KSE_Footsteps_Ground_Snow x 5 files (3 steps in 3 versions / Single walking / Single running)
KSE_Footsteps_Water x 5 files (3 steps in 3 versions / Single walking / Single running)
